title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the antiderivative of x n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3832@

1 point is earned for the answer

∫ 0 1 x n dx= x n+1 n+1 | 0 1 = 1 n+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4CC1@

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if slope of line l is n

1 point is earned if base of T is 1 n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37D2@

1 point is earned if shows area is 1 2n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@388E@

Let b be the length of the base of triangle T.

1 b MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37C6@ is the slope of line l, which is n

Area(T)= 1 2 b(1)= 1 2n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4550@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the area of S in terms of n

1 point is earned for the derivative

1 point is earned if sets derivative equal to 0

1 point is earned if solves for n

Area(S)= ∫ 0 1 x n dx− Area(T)               = 1 n+1 − 1 2n d dn Area(S)=− 1 (n+1) 2 + 1 2 n 2 =0 2 n 2 = ( n+1 ) 2 2 n=(n+1) n= 1 2 −1 =1+ 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@8A58@
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the area of S in terms of n

1 point is earned for the derivative

1 point is earned if sets derivative equal to 0
